attributes.additional_details:
I am proposing that the PM's Country home be sold to raise funds. After all we are 'All in this together' and 'Tough Decisions must be made. The money made will go towards paying off the deficit and reduce the number of cuts that impact many people.
The property is used less than 20% of the year by the Prime Minister, who will still have No 10, that is 40 Miles away.

I am also suggesting that No 11 be vacated by the Chancellor, it can then be used to house overseas guests as required.
